<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns the gap between the memory locations accessed by \\p I0 and</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a52c21a2bc9e5238472dabfd4183158e5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::optional&lt;int&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a52c21a2bc9e5238472dabfd4183158e5">getPointerDiffInBytes</a>(LoadOrStoreT &#42;I0,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(std::is&#95;same&#95;v&lt;LoadOrStoreT, LoadInst&gt; ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">                      std::is&#95;same&#95;v&lt;LoadOrStoreT, StoreInst&gt;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected sandboxir::Load or sandboxir::Store!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Opnd0 = I0-&gt;getPointerOperand()-&gt;Val;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Opnd1 = I1-&gt;getPointerOperand()-&gt;Val;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Ptr0 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(Opnd0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Ptr1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(Opnd1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ptr0 != Ptr1)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">                           SE, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;StrictCheck=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;CheckType=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns true if \\p I0 accesses a memory location lower than \\p I1.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns false if the difference cannot be determined, if the memory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// locations are equal, or if I1 accesses a memory location greater than I0.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadOrStoreT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a283da28f49cf79afe0661c5b84db7910"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a283da28f49cf79afe0661c5b84db7910">atLowerAddress</a>(LoadOrStoreT &#42;I0, LoadOrStoreT &#42;I1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
